domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: I’d like to hear Republicans try to defend $160 billion in tax cuts they gave to millionaires & billionaires in a Covid-19 relief package. If they can’t, they can sign on to my bill to repeal these ridiculous provisions and use the money to help those actually in need.
